Liquid Galaxy

Liquid Galaxy is a cluster of computers running Google Earth to create an immersive experience.

Learn more »

Get the Code

The Liquid Galaxy combines several apps for viewing content as well as libraries to support those apps in a properly maintained system. The Liquid Galaxy can run on Linux, Apple, and Windows systems (note: anecdotal evidence shows Linux to be the most stable). For your given platform, please download and install all 3 files.

OS File Name File Size
Linux Liquid Galaxy File #1 45 Mb Download
Linux Liquid Galaxy File #2 33 Mb Download
Linux Liquid Galaxy File #3 19 Mb Download
Apple Liquid Galaxy File #1 45 Mb Download
Apple Liquid Galaxy File #2 33 Mb Download
Apple Liquid Galaxy File #3 19 Mb Download
Windows Liquid Galaxy File #1 45 Mb Download
Windows Liquid Galaxy File #2 33 Mb Download
Windows Liquid Galaxy File #3 19 Mb Download
